document.discussion_title: Three-story food hall planned for Brickell City Centre
document.topic_text: Three-story food hall planned for Brickell City Centre the Web An air of Italy in Brickell A European artisanal food market will anchor the $1.05 billion Brickell City Centre in Miami, the South Florida Business Journal reports. Swire Properties, along with retail co-developers Whitman Family Development and Simon Property Group, have signed a lease for a three-story space in the open air shopping center under construction in the Brickell financial district. A food market is the heart and soul of most major Italian cities; now the same will be true here in Miami," the companies said in a statement.
